job_title: Scientific Business Analyst - Formulation and Preclinical Development
full_description:
\n
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced
Scientific Business Analyst
to join our Research IT team, focusing on the
Formulation and Preclinical Development
domains within the Pharmaceutical industry. This role requires extensive domain expertise, a strong understanding of laboratory informatics systems, and proven change management abilities to successfully implement and drive the adoption of new technological solutions.
\n
Key Responsibilities
\n
\n
Scientific Business Analysis:
Serve as the subject matter expert bridging the gap between scientific Formulation/Preclinical Development teams and IT. Elicit, analyze, and document complex business requirements for laboratory informatics solutions.
\n
System Expertise:
Apply deep knowledge of
Labware LIMS
and
IDBS ELN
to configure, optimize, and support these systems for the research community.
\n
Project Management & Execution:
Utilize
Jira
and
Agile
methodologies to manage the lifecycle of IT projects, ensuring successful and timely delivery of solutions.
\n
Change Management & Adoption:
Lead comprehensive
Change Management
initiatives for the rollout of new systems. Develop and deliver training, documentation, and communication strategies to ensure high user adoption across the research organization.
\n
Process Modeling:
Use tools like
Lucid
to map, analyze, and optimize scientific and data flow processes within the Formulation and Preclinical Development areas.
\n
Regulatory Knowledge:
Ensure solutions align with industry best practices and understand the impact of data standards on
Regulatory Submission
processes.
\n
Leadership:
Provide technical and domain
Leadership
for project teams, mentoring junior colleagues and influencing stakeholders.
\n
\n
Required Qualifications
\n
\n
Extensive expertise
in the
Formulation/Preclinical Development
domain within a Pharma or Biotech setting.
\n
Solid understanding and hands-on experience
with lab informatics, specifically
Labware LIMS
implementation, configuration, or administration.
\n
Familiarity with other key scientific informatics platforms, such as
IDBS ELN
.
\n
Demonstrated experience using
Jira
and working within
Agile
development methodologies.
\n
Strong ability to execute and lead
Change Management
activities for technology rollouts.
\n
Knowledge of data governance and standards related to
Regulatory Submission
.
\n
Excellent communication, presentation, and stakeholder management skills.
\n
Benefits of the
Scientific Business Analyst
: \n
\n
MUST be able to work onsite 4 days per week in Tarrytown, NY
\n
10 Days PTO
\n
Health, Dental, and Vision Insurance
\n
Matching 401k
\n
Pay: $100/hr-$110/hr
\n
